DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate efficacy daily intake fortified bread vitamin D serum 25-hydroxyvitamin D level , glycemic lipidemic status healthy subject compare vitamin D supplement .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Efficacy Vitamin D-fortified Bread Healthy Adults
DOC.detailed_description: Sixty apparently healthy subject select . Participants receive vitamin D , calcium omega-3 supplement within last three month exclude . Subjects assign randomly one three intervention group : 1.fortified bread+placebo,2 . plain bread+vitamin D supplements,3 . plain bread+placebo . Each participant consume 50 g bread supplement placebo every day 2 month . At first last visit , dietary laboratory assessment perform subject . Primary outcome improvement vitamin D status secondary outcome improvement glycemic lipidemic marker prevention problem related hypovitaminosis D .
DOC.criteria: 20 50 year healthy subject receive vitamin D omega3 supplement 3 month later receive vitamin D omega3 supplement study
